suggest.ext-pdo: Required to use the database queue worker.
suggest.ext-filter: Required to use the SQS queue worker.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Required to use the database failed job providers.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver and DynamoDb failed job storage (^3.235.5).
suggest.hlx/redis: Required to use the Redis queue driver (^1.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk queue driver (^4.0).
